BackstoryDef.title: Manufactured Alpha
BackstoryDef.description: Mechadroids are not born, they are made, subtle imperfections result in various traits in their personality but their initial skills tend to be rather specific. Alphas are capable of any task, though they aren't really good at anything.

BackstoryDef.title: Perfect Alpha
BackstoryDef.description: Mechadroids are not born, they are made, subtle imperfections result in various traits in their personality but their initial skills tend to be rather specific. This alpha came out even better than in the blueprint, still not particularly great in any specific way though.

BackstoryDef.title: Faulty Alpha
BackstoryDef.description: Mechadroids are not born, they are made, subtle imperfections result in various traits in their personality but their initial skills tend to be rather specific. This Alpha came out a slight bit faulty so their skills have been skewed here and there.
